alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Howard; Lafayette; Little River; Miller; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 04 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. Many roads are still impassable or washed out. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Arkansas, including the following counties, Hempstead, Howard, Lafayette, Little River, Miller and Nevada. * WHEN...Until 615 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 313 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 5 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Texarkana, Hope, Emmet, Perrytown, Fulton, McNab, Patmos, Oakhaven, Hervey, Homan, Piney Grove, Red Bluff, Bright Star and Millwood. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Hempstead; Howard; Lafayette; Little River; Miller; Nevada
